snippet: Kevin J. Lipson, co-head of Hogan Lovells's energy practice, and four colleagues are joining DLA Piper in Washington. The five do much of their work in the natural gas sector, which has seen a flurry of deal-making.
abstract: Kevin J. Lipson, co-head of Hogan Lovells's energy practice, and four colleagues are joining DLA Piper in Washington. The five do much of their work in the natural gas sector, which has seen a flurry of deal-making.
lead_paragraph: Big news in Big Law: Five partners at Hogan Lovells have announced that they are leaving the firm to join DLA Piper.

headline.main: DLA Piper Hires 5 Energy Lawyers From Hogan Lovells
